instructions:
Thoroughly cream together sugar and shortening. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each
addition. Add flour, soda, salt and buttermilk, mixing until smooth. Meanwhile, pour boiling water over
"100% Bran"; let stand until cereal has absorbed water and has cooled slightly. Blend this mixture into
batter. Add "All-Bran", mixing thoroughly. Use immediately, or refrigerate batter covered up to five weeks.
When ready to use, dip batter *(without stirring)* into 2 1/2 inch paper cups in a muffin tin. Bake in oven
preheated to 400 degrees about 20 minutes or until done. Makes 3 dozen muffins. Recipe may be doubled.
name: Bran Muffins
creator: Marian McCormick
